A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have so much love for the franchise and the universe of STAR WARS\, feels shitty to leave the movie theater thinking wtf was the director thinking. I would imagine someone directing STAR WARS would know that throwing build up in the garbage just doesn't work. Don't even get me started with the story telling issues\, and how this movie goes against so much of what's already established in the previous movies. The character assassination of Luke Skywalker hurts the most.
